markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blank Slate](/Feats.aspx?ID=4979) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 176 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

Your deceptions confound even the most powerful magic that could spy on you. Detection, revelation, and scrying effects pass right over you, your possessions, and your auras, detecting nothing unless the detecting effect has a counteract rank of 10 or higher. For example, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area but not any magic on you, truesight wouldn’t reveal you, locate or scrying wouldn’t find you, and so on.
name: Blank Slate

summary_markdown: Your deceptions confound even the most powerful magic that could spy on you.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 16" pfs="Standard" > Blank Slate Source Player Core pg. 176 2.0 Prerequisites Legendary in Deception --- Your deceptions confound even the most powerful magic that could spy on you. Detection, revelation, and scrying effects pass right over you, your possessions, and your auras, detecting nothing unless the detecting effect has a counteract rank of 10 or higher. For example, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area but not any magic on you, truesight wouldn’t reveal you, locate or scrying wouldn’t find you, and so on.
